response.original_title: Persian Tales, Jean Rouch in Iran
response.overview: Persian Tales, Jean Rouch in Iran is about the discovery of the deep relation of Jean Rouch with Iranian filmmakers. Jean Rouch, a French filmmaker and ethnologist, traveled three times to Iran in the 1970s . He gave several workshop and made a film in Isfahan. The iranian cinema today still have been directly and indirectly influenced not only by Jean Rouch’s method, but also through his vision and his sociological work. Persian Talesshow how the young generation of iranian filmmakers, like Jean Rouch think about how camera can change reality!
response.title: Persian Tales, Jean Rouch in Iran

titles.title: Contes Persans, Jean Rouch en Iran

results.name: Jean Rouch Regards Persans, un film de Mina Rad, soutenu par la Fondation Jean Rouch
